name: UpdatePowerUpListing
description:
Update an existing listing for a Trello Power-Up.

Call this tool to update information on an existing listing for a Trello Power-Up, identified by specific plugin and listing IDs.

parameters.name: power_up_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Power-Up whose listing is being updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Power-Up whose listing is being updated.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The ID of the existing listing for the Power-Up that is being updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the existing listing for the Power-Up that is being updated.

parameters.name: listing_description
parameters.description: The description to show for the specified locale of the Power-Up listing.

value_schema.description: The description to show for the given locale

parameters.name: listing_locale
parameters.description: The locale code for displaying the listing, e.g., 'en' for English.

value_schema.description: The locale that this listing should be displayed for.

parameters.name: overview_for_locale
parameters.description: Provide the overview text for the specified locale to update the listing.

value_schema.description: The overview to show for the given locale.

parameters.name: localized_name
parameters.description: The name of the listing to display for the specified locale.

value_schema.description: The name to use for the given locale.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: idPlugin
parameters.description: The ID of the Power-Up whose listing is being updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Power-Up whose listing is being updated.

parameters.name: idListing
parameters.description: The ID of the existing listing for the Power-Up that is being updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the existing listing for the Power-Up that is being updated.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description to show for the given locale

value_schema.description: The description to show for the given locale

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale that this listing should be displayed for.

value_schema.description: The locale that this listing should be displayed for.

parameters.name: overview
parameters.description: The overview to show for the given locale.

value_schema.description: The overview to show for the given locale.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name to use for the given locale.

value_schema.description: The name to use for the given locale.
